body.name: Reset HDD Button Switch，GELRHONR Desktop PC Computer Case Power Supply Supplies on/Off with Dual USB Ports，Audio Ports and Reset HDD Push Button Switch for Home, Office, Internet Cafes(Cable 120CM
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 1 hr 34 mins
features: ✪ EASY TO START PC：It has double sided tape on the bottom so you can stick it to something. Located computer in a hard to reach area like in the closet, this is a convenient switch on the desk with 120cm cable，and hitting it rather than bend down to turn the computer on.

✪ DUAL USB PORTS AND AUDIO PORTS：Two USB ports can be used for Mouse, keyboard, USB desk lamp, USB fan and charging，also be used for data transfer of mobile phones, USB flash drives, cameras, etc.A good replacement for broken computer host switch.

✪ DETACHABLE DESIGN：There Is a Metal Sleeve fixed with adapter on PCI slot, It can prevent the cable from being accidentally pulled out and damage the motherboard, and it is more convenient and beautiful when moving the computer.
✪ APPLICABLE SCENES：Office，home，Internet cafe,，school computer room,，multimedia classroom, computer modification, etc.
✪ NOTE: Need to connect a USB cable for normal use of all functions of the computer desktop switch！
body.description: 【Specification】 Product name: Desktop switch for desktop computer LED Color: Blue Color: black + silver Material (External) : Plastic Switch Cable Length: 120cm. Length of Cable Inside PC Case: 33cm. Desktop Switch Size: 76×76×26mm N.W.：173g G.W.：203g Fixed Method: Adhesive on the desktop Ports:Reset HDD Button Switch + Dual USB Ports + Audio Design : USB,Power LED+,Power LED-,Reset SW,Power SW, H.D.D LED Easy to install. Switching the computer easier. If you want a nice power switch with real durability and conveniences, this is the switch for you.My computer is now hiding in the closet. Ran the cables through the wall. Packing list: 1×computer desktop switch, 1×cable, 1×box

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.2 4.2 out of 5 stars 90 ratings 4.2 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Quality Product
reviews.reviewText: Well made, easy to install and performs as advertised. Very pleased with product and would buy again. If you want to retain original PC switch function be sure to order B07ZGF6NV4 Y connector cable set.UPDATE: After 7 months of use one of the two USB ports stopped working. When flash drive is plugged in to port USB connector Windows outputs error “drive not recognized”; confirmed to be a USB connector failure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for a Windows 10/64 desktop system in the recording studio. The power on/off button works perfectly every time. The USB hub works, but only sometimes for me, and not consistently. I know some devices don't like to run through certain types of hubs, and this might be one of those. This is on a 12th-generation Intel i7 CPU on an ASUS Z690 mobo. The audio connectors do work, but we rarely use them, so I can't say how "good" they are. The only thing I really dislike is the adhesive mounting. I would much rather see a couple of screw holes as an option for mounting (I realize for some that the adhesive is just fine). The construction feels fairly sound, but it is almost entirely of plastic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars USB part is useless.
reviews.reviewText: The pinout of the HD DB15 is obviously been chosen based on what pin was closest. There is no care about twisted pairs or shielding. So the ribbon cable to the internal USB pin header is useless. So just put a piece of tape over the front and cover the USB ports and audio jacks. It's also good to add a 120 ohm resistor in series with the computer's power LED if you want both the box LED and the case LED to work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than the cheap option
reviews.reviewText: the cheap flimsy wired option is very fragile. Unless somehow the button is firmly anchored the wires will break after too many uses.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I like how easy the set up was. That it works as listed. But I wish the power cord running to the computer actually screwed into the port. It even came with screws. The cord is very loose in the slot, if you bump it even a little bit it falls out and Poof power off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great, easy to use.

reviews.reviewerName: I had to move my pc, disconnected the blue blug, and it bent all the pins… the connection is flimsy and it’s really lame that it fell apart so quickly.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The pins on the back bent all out of shape and even after trying to straighten them out it never worked again properly. Super flimsy and not worth it…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Extremely Interesting Design
reviews.reviewText: This little thing surprised me quite a bit.First, the PCI bracket passthrough uses a 15 pin serial connector.The power and reset buttons/LED connections are what you expect.I assumed that the audio would be from the board, and the USB would be a hub of sorts.But instead, it's a USB audio device, and the USB ports are directly connected to the internal header for full speed.Very interesting, and works great.

reviews.reviewTitle: It works, D-sub connector is a huge advantage over other models!
reviews.reviewText: For me the main purpose of this device was to put the power button somewhere I could easily access, and it does that flawlessly. The power LED and reset buttons are a bonus. If you also want to keep using your old switches & LED, you will need to add Y-splitters for 0.1" pitch rectangular headers. These are easy to buy, or make, but are not included in the package.The DE-15 connector that joins the external cable to the included slot cover is an absolute godsend, and in my opinion is what makes this better than all the similar (non-wireless) products I looked at before I bought this: Every other similar switch I've seen leaves you with thin, breakable wire just hanging out the back of the chassis, just begging for trouble. With this, you can simply unplug the remote switch like any other peripheral if you need to move your computer. Note: If you don't have any available full-height slots, the connector may instead be mounted in a D-sub cut-out for a serial port or VGA connector, which most chassis offer one or two of.As other reviews have mentioned, the USB features aren't great: The audio is quite cheap, and the USB ports appear to be wired to USB1.1 standard (i.e. suitable for stable 12Mbps data), which is fine for older or low-bandwith devices. If you need high-performance USB extension: This isn't it, buy a USB-3 hub or extension cord to go with it. Personally I've left the audio device un-plugged, and don't use the two USB ports much.

reviews.reviewTitle: I feel like a super villain when I turn on my PC...
reviews.reviewText: I just installed it on the underside of my desk. I'm only using it to turn on and reset my PC. Works fine on the the first try. The build quality is good and the adhesive will hold the item to the bottom side of a surface. The cables are easy to route in tighter spots and the texture of the casing helps things stay in place.I have it setup on the bottom side of my desk to turn on and reset my PC. The button feels firm and there is no give to the casing when the button is depressed. There is a clear click sound when depressed so you know when things are happening. The amount of pressure needed to press the button is perfect to avoid accidently turning my PC off.I chose this item because I like the reset button feature, the adhesive on the base and the length of cables. For my intended use (power/reset) it works better than I anticipated. I feel a bit like a mad super villain sending some one to the dungeon when I turn my PC on... My girlfriend jokes that it is my 'old man button'. However it is said, the item works and I am a happy customer.

reviews.reviewTitle: Well made and smartly designed external power/reset switch.
reviews.reviewText: Button is nice and tactile and behaves like a proper PC power button. In other words, it has a springy feeling when clicked once and powers on the PC. Button does not feel cheap andit also lights up blue. The housing has good weight to it (I actually didn't need to mount with adhesive even though it comes with it). When logged into Windows, the same click of the button gracefully shuts down the PC and the OS recognizes the input. If you hold the button down for 4-seconds, it hard powers off the PC. Having the smaller Reset button on the side is super handy as well. The USB and connector cables are high quality and don't feel flimsy. I have an open air mining rig, so I like the fact I can install the metal bracket anywhere onto the framework and the modular design allows me to plug in the switch to the port on the bracket from there. Very functional and versatile!
The power switch stopped working I spent an hour taking board and psu cables out. The light was working but the button decided to go kaput! Not so good quality for the price!
